channel.title: [SFoL 56] Grande Idea V2 Game Thread(4/18) - Day 6: The Mind Flayer, Deranged Fan, and Seymour Skinner have won!
channel.description:
# Grand Idea V2 Game thread
Hosted by @SirDerpsAlot and @Marshal .
This setup follows simple forum rules
1. [https://toli.es/rules ](https://toli.es/rules) 2. [Official Forum Mafia and Forum of Lies Rules](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926/)
**Gameplay**
Days will be 48 hours long, or shorter if someone is lynched. Nights will be 24 hours long or until everyone has submitted their actions. All classes will be rolled from the Grand Idea V2 thread Game balance will be considered when rolling classes, to attempt to still make the game enjoyable Wincons will be standardized If you have any suggestions or something you would like to see, feel free to ask. Mafia has an Unassigned Factional Kill.
**Executions**
To accuse someone say “ **/accuse [player]** ” or “ **/vote [player]** ” Executions end the day. Executions will be majority + plurality.
**After The Night**
Only investigative abilities will return feedback unless the class says otherwise. It will either be a result , ‘‘for whatever reason, you could not investigate your target’, or ‘you were redirected to a different target they are [invest result]’ (no name)
**Role List**
![|20x20](https://forum.imperium42.com/user_avatar/forum.imperium42.com/luxy/40/18622_2.png) [SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-grand-idea-class-thread-v2/78691/1) [Forum of Lies ](https://forum.imperium42.com/c/forum-matches/forum-of-lies)
> Rules: Every post here must contain a class. It could be an existing one or something new. If the class is an existing FoL class, the name is simply enough to qualify it. If it is a class that is already in this thread, put down the name hyperlinked to the post in this thread that includes its class card. Otherwise you must make the entire class card. Classes must adhere to [this format](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-suggestion-template/47799). (Although for Blue Dragon classes, the objective can instead read “ Your objective is to defeat the scum fact…
Players:
1. Squid 2. ~~Soul~~ [Died N1][Color=regblue] The Tavern Keeper[/color] 3. ~~Issac~~[Lynched D4] [Color=redblue] Alice [/color] 4. ~~wazz~~[Died N4] [Color=lighblue] Preistess Of Law[/color] 5. ~~Italy~~ [Died N3] [color=lighblue] Izuna hatsuse[/color] 6. ~~Jgoes~~ [Lynched D2] [color=regblue]KyoDaz[/color] 7. Katze [Died N2][Color=Grey] Theobald Leonhearts[/color] 8. ~~Jake~~ [Died N2][Color=regblue] Laura Bodewig[/color] 9. ~~Tele :crown:~~[[color=red]MODKILLED[/color] D5] [Color=regblue] Chosen By the Chalice[/color] 10. Priestess [Died N2][Color=regblue] The Brewer[/color] 11. ~~Kyo~~ ~~Simon~~[Died N4] [Color=dedghkeqasd]Evil Efina[/color] 12. ~~Vul~~ [Lynched D2][color=regblue] Marinette Dupain-Cheng[/color] 13. Arete 14. ~~Boss~~ [Died N1][Color=regblue] The Heiress[/color] 15. Luxy 16. Insanity [Lynched D3] [Color=dedghkeqasd] Princess Justice[/color] 17. Maxwell 18. Hja [Lynched D5] [Color=dedghkeqasd] The Harbringer[/color]
Backups:
Spectators: 2. DatBird 3. Astand 4. Sulit
Class roles: [color=]Rand King[/color] [color=cult]Rand Groupscum[/color] [color=cult]Rand Groupscum[/color] [color=cult]Rand Groupscum[/color] [color=cult]Rand Groupscum[/color]/[color=PINK]Rand Neutral Killer[/color] [color= steblue]Rand Town[/color] [color=steblue]Rand Town[/color] [color=steblue]Rand Town[/color] [color=steblue]Rand Town[/color] [color=steblue]Rand Town[/color] [color=steblue]Rand Town[/color] [color=steblue]Rand Town[/color] [color=steblue]Rand Town[/color] [color=steblue]Rand Town[/color] [color=steblue]Rand Town[/color] [color=Yellow]Rand Neut[/color] [color=Yellow]Rand Neut[/color] [color=steblue]Rand Town[/color]/[color=Yellow]Rand Neut[/color]
# Timestamps:
[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/Grande-idea-v2-game-thread-18-18-night-1-the-quiet-after-the-storm/79225/1857?u=marshal]End of Day 1/Start of Day 2[/url]
[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/grande-idea-v2-game-thread-16-18-day-2-double-death-doldrums/79225/2080?u=marshal] Jgoes is Lynched + Bountied[/url]
[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/grande-idea-v2-game-thread-10-18-night-3-justice-served/79225/5989?u=marshal]End of Day 2/Start of Day 3 [/url]
[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/grande-idea-v2-game-thread-10-18-night-3-justice-served/79225/6338?u=marshal]End of Day 3/Start of Day 4 [/url]
[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/grande-idea-v2-game-thread-9-18-night-4-isaac-gonezalez/79225/6558?u=marshal] End of Day 4/Start of Day 5 [/url]
[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/grande-idea-v2-game-thread-5-18-day-5-drunk-from-the-chalice/79225/6705?u=marshal] Teleology is Modkilled[/url]

item.title: [SFoL 56] Grande Idea V2 Game Thread(4/18) - Day 6: The Mind Flayer, Deranged Fan, and Seymour Skinner have won!

item.description:
yeah i know but we didn’t expect that to happen at all.

Read full topic

item.title: [SFoL 56] Grande Idea V2 Game Thread(4/18) - Day 6: The Mind Flayer, Deranged Fan, and Seymour Skinner have won!
item.dc:creator: anon97870008
item.description:
Well, lesson learned. It’s important to make the night feedback as clear as possible. I doubt it would have happened with “the list contains only bd players/the list contains not solely bd players” or something like that

Read full topic

also iirc isaac’s first language is english so idk.

item.title: [SFoL 56] Grande Idea V2 Game Thread(4/18) - Day 6: The Mind Flayer, Deranged Fan, and Seymour Skinner have won!
item.dc:creator: Maxwell
item.description:
Vulgard:

I think I can say ‘our’ given my contributions

They’re more yours than mine mate.

A good amount of the classes were just copied from the Return of the BD III and FoL setups. I designed some HoB classes and a new NK, the Electromagnetic Channeler, and renamed some Neutral Non-Killers, but you helped to refine everything greatly which is amazingly appreciated.

Read full topic

item.description:

I have had multiple high and low activity games as both alignments based on how busy I get with school.

item.description:
Shurian:

My major peeve is that you can’t bot an account in Discourse. Like, there has been attempts, but no instances of it thus far.

You are forgetting our lord and saviour

[FM] Lord of the Rings Forum Mafia - (7/25) - Completed - Mafia Wins!
Voted Voters Number
The Shire Icibalus (#30), H_Hja (#81), Solic (#466), DatBird (#1066), Alice (#1570), Vulgard (#1598), MaximusPrime (#1720), Firekitten (#1759), astand (#1808), Andrej (#1845), Kai_5 (#2027), Magnus (#2287), Alice (#2288), Marshal (#2292), Hippolytus (#2299), Simon (#2366) 16

The Shire has been lynched.

They were:
